TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ManagementNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: El atributo ManagementName se usa para invalidar nombres expuestos a través de una clase WMI.

span.span: The ManagementName attribute is used to override names exposed through a WMI class.

summary.span: Nota: Las bibliotecas .NET de WMI ahora se consideran en estado final y no estarán disponibles desarrollos posteriores, mejoras o actualizaciones para problemas no relacionados con la seguridad que afectan a estas bibliotecas.

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: Las [API de MI](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) deben usarse para todo el nuevo desarrollo.

span.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: The user-friendly name for the object.

summary.span: Inicializa una instancia nueva de la clase usando el nombre especificado.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: Obtiene o establece el nombre descriptivo para un objeto.

span.span: Gets or sets the user-friendly name for an object.

summary.span: El objeto puede ser un parámetro de método o las propiedades marcadas con los atributos ManagementProbe, ManagementKey o ManagementConfiguration.

span.span: The object can be a method parameter or properties marked with the ManagementProbe, ManagementKey, or ManagementConfiguration attributes.

value.span: Valor que indica el nombre descriptivo para un objeto.

span.span: A value that indicates the user friendly name for an object.
